Avant Torrejon is a 3-star property near Madrid Airport, IFEMA and the congress centre, making it the ideal accommodation choice for business guests. This Hotel opens in January 2010.
Business guests can take advantage of the first-class service with facilities offered including restaurant, snack bar, long-term parking and complimentary shuttle to IFEMA, Madrid city centre and Barajas Airport.
There are 78 guestrooms at Hotel Avant Torrejon, including double, twin, family room and triple.
Hotel Avant Torrejon boasts 78 spacious rooms, ideally equipped for business guests, with facilities such as wireless and cable internet access. The rooms are nicely decorated with wooden furniture and warm colours]]></ReportDetail><LastWriteTime>2016-08-23 오후 3:43:10</LastWriteTime></AdditionalReport><AdditionalReport><ReportTypeCode>DT06</ReportTypeCode><ReportTypeCodeName>Report</ReportTypeCodeName><ReportTypeName><![CDATA[]]></ReportTypeName><ReportTitle><![CDATA[]]></ReportTitle><ReportDetail><![CDATA[Located in Torrejon and just minutes away from Madrid Barajas T4 Terminal.
Out east, the magnificent new Terminal 4 at Barajas Airport is the largest in the world. All terminals are accessible by metro (pink line 8), shuttle bus, taxi or the 200 or 204 buses from Avenida de América.]]></ReportDetail><LastWriteTime>2016-08-23 오후 3:43:10</LastWriteTime></AdditionalReport></AdditionalReportList><AvailableBedList></AvailableBedList><HotelGroup><ChainCode><BasicCode>BWT01</BasicCode><BasicName>BEST WESTERN</BasicName></ChainCode><ChainCode><BasicCode>COM01</BasicCode><BasicName>COMFORT INN</BasicName></ChainCode><ChainCode><BasicCode>HIL01</BasicCode><BasicName>HILTON</BasicName></ChainCode><ChainCode><BasicCode>HOL01</BasicCode><BasicName>HOLIDAY INN</BasicName></ChainCode><ChainCode><BasicCode>IBI01</BasicCode><BasicName>IBIS</BasicName></ChainCode><ChainCode><BasicCode>INT01</BasicCode><BasicName>INTER CONTINENTAL</BasicName></ChainCode><ChainCode><BasicCode>NON01</BasicCode><BasicName>NONE(해당없음)</BasicName></ChainCode><TypeCode><BasicCode>APT01</BasicCode><BasicName>APARTMENT</BasicName></TypeCode><TypeCode><BasicCode>BTQ01</BasicCode><BasicName>BOUTIQUE</BasicName></TypeCode><TypeCode><BasicCode>HOT01</BasicCode><BasicName>HOTEL</BasicName></TypeCode><TypeCode><BasicCode>NON01</BasicCode><BasicName>NONE(해당없음)</BasicName></TypeCode><TypeCode><BasicCode>ONS01</BasicCode><BasicName>ONSEN</BasicName></TypeCode><TypeCode><BasicCode>RES01</BasicCode><BasicName>RESIDENCE</BasicName></TypeCode><TypeCode><BasicCode>VIL01</BasicCode><BasicName>VILLA</BasicName></TypeCode></HotelGroup></HotelInformation></HotelList></GetHotelInformationResult></GetHotelInformationResponse></Return>
